about_the_game:
Experience a world of unique style and gameplay in the spirit of old-school shooters. Exosuit is a first-person shooter inspired by games like DOOM and Quake. The aim of the game is not to make you delve into complex plot twists, but to fill your blood with adrenaline through dynamic and exhilarating gameplay. Take the most powerful gun in your hands and fight your way to the final boss!

This demo version is a good reason to see the quality of the game.

Unique features of the game:

*Dynamic and driving gameplay;

*Unique visual style;

*Big replayability, due to the non-leniency of some levels;

*Unusual for the genre geometry of levels with an emphasis on platforming;

DEMO CONTAINS ONE BIG FIRST LEVEL!

NOTE FOR WINDOWS 11 USERS:

For correct display of weapons the resolution of the game and your screen must be completely the same.
